GK19gp01-11u:8: [1] tad evam ārambhasambhavadantarmahasā sahasā vilikhya tad idam ullikhyate |
GK19gp01-11u:9: kim idam? madiṣṭadevasya, madanviṣṭadayāśiṣṭatadbhakta-samudayasya ca kramataḥ smaraṇam āvirbhūtam |
GK19gp01-11u:10: kiṃ vā, kevalasya madiṣṭa-devasya; kiṃ vā, tadviśiṣṭasya |
GK19gp01-11u:11: āṃ āṃ, tantratas tat trayam api svatantratayā labhyate |

GK19gp01-11u:22: na tadvad anyo dhanyo' pi janaḥ sambhavati |

GK19gp01-11u:49: ye ca nāthā mukhyā iti vikhyātagāthās,

GK19gp01-11u:145_3: brahma-hrade majjanena tasmād unmajjanena ca taj-jana-kautuka-jananād anantaraṃ chandaḥ-stūyamānenātmanāvitrā

GK19gp01-11u:900: [60] kṛṣṇaḥ sahāsam- āha sma, “mātar, na te pretajātitām avāptāḥ |

GK19gp01-11u:904: [61] tataś ca sarvāsu gata-sandehāsu snehātiśayāt kṛṣṇa-mātā savyena pāṇinā pṛṣṭham,

GK19gp01-11u:2510: bālo yo mama jātas tasmād adhikaś ca vāsudevo yaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2511: nija-dṛk-sudhayā taṃ taṃ śīkitum āstāṃ bhavān karuṇaḥ ||JGc_1,6.24|| [upagīti]
GK19gp01-11u:2512: [32] tad etad āśrutya gargaḥ sa-gadgadaṃ jagāda-
GK19gp01-11u:2513: “yan-manā bhikṣur āyātas tad dātā ditsati svayam |
GK19gp01-11u:2514: tadā bhāgyaṃ kiyad varṇyaṃ bhikṣor dātuś ca kauśalam? ||JGc_1,6.25|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2515: [33] tad evam ātmane ślāghamāne muni-rāje śrī-vrajarājaḥ sva-niyojyasya karṇe varṇitavān,
GK19gp01-11u:2519_0: [34] sampravadamānayoś ca tayoḥ so' pi tat-prayojanaṃ parāmṛśya śuddhāntaṃ praviśya
GK19gp01-11u:2529: [35] atha saṅkocaṃ vidhāya sannidhāya mātṛbhyām ātmanātmajābhyāṃ ca maunenaivānāmi muni-varaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2530: so' yam uccakair āśīśiṣac ca, yathā,
GK19gp01-11u:2535: [36] tataś ca, tad-eka-sarge garge vrajeśvara-yācanataḥ svāsanam āgate purataḥ kiñcid dūrataḥ:
GK19gp01-11u:2538: [37] tato muner ādeśatas te' py upaviviśituś ca |
GK19gp01-11u:2545: [38] garga uvāca-“bhavanto yadu-bījyatve' pi vaiśyatatījya-mātṛ-vaṃśānvayitayā tad-guru-padavyāgatair eva karma kārayitavyāḥ na tu mayā |“
GK19gp01-11u:2547: kintu kvacid utsarge' py apavāda-vargaṃ bādhate' dhikāri-viśeṣa-śleṣam āsādya,
GK19gp01-11u:2548: yathaivāhiṃsā-nivṛtta-karmaṇi baddha-śraddhaṃ prati yajñe' pi paśu-hiṃsāṃ |
GK19gp01-11u:2549: tasmād bhavatāṃ brāhmaṇa-bhāvād utsarga-siddhā gurutā śraddhā-viśeṣavatām asmākaṃ kule kathaṃ laghutām āpnotu?
GK19gp01-11u:2550: tatrāpi bhavataḥ sarva-pramāṇataḥ samadhikatā samadhigatā, tasmād anyathā mā sma manyathāḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2551: etad upari nija-purohitānām api hitam apihita-mahasā kariṣyāmaḥ |“
GK19gp01-11u:2552: [40] gargaḥ punar atigopanāya sa-vicāram uvāca-“tatrāpi khalaḥ sa khalu devakī-toka-hantā durmantā devyāḥ śaṃsanena nṛśaṃsaḥ kaṃsaḥ punar āgatāśaṅkaḥ syāt |
GK19gp01-11u:2553: yasmād yādava-gurutayā puru-prasiddhaḥ so' yam anya-vargajam amuṃ samaskuruta,
GK19gp01-11u:2554: tasmād eva vasudeva-kṛtopāsanayā nūnam anayā devyā svena vinimitaḥ sa bālas tatra vartate,
GK19gp01-11u:2557: [41] atha vrajarājas tu manāg vimanāyamāna ivāsīt |
GK19gp01-11u:2559: anena svasti-vācanādike kṛte sarvaṃ śastaṃ bhaved iti vibhāvya provāca-“yasmāt tava saṅga eva sa-maṅgalas tasmāt,
GK19gp01-11u:2560: alakṣito' smin rahasi māmakair api go-vraje |
GK19gp01-11u:2562: [42] garga uvāca-“bhavatu, bhavad-icchayā yadṛcchayā maṅgalaṃ saṅgamayiṣyate |
GK19gp01-11u:2563: tataḥ samaya-sammatatvād āpātatas tu nāma-karaṇam eva karavāṇi” iti svasti-vācanādy ācarya provāca tatrāgrajam uddiśya, yathā:
GK19gp01-11u:2565: mukhyaṃ lokam aśeṣam eṣa ramayan rāmo, balitvād balaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2567: saṅkrakṣyaty ubhayatra bhāva-tulayā svaṃ tena saṅkarṣaṇaḥ ||JGc_1,6.31|| [śārdula]
GK19gp01-11u:2574: jāto yasmāt tato vāsudeva ity api gīyate ||JGc_1,6.33|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2577: sākalyato nahi vayaṃ yadi tāni vidmo,
GK19gp01-11u:2578: jānanti tarhi na pare tv iti paunaruktyam ||JGc_1,6.34|| [vasantatilakā]
GK19gp01-11u:2580: “lagnaṃ hṛdi na lagnaṃ naḥ, sarvajñas tad bhavān gatiḥ ||JGc_1,6.35|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2583: gargas tasmai rādhyati sma prahasan mahasānvitaḥ ||JGc_1,6.36|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2584: [44] “tad etad asmākaṃ khamāṇikyanāmni jyotirgranthe prāg eva nirupitamasti |
GK19gp01-11u:2587: naiśīthaḥ samayo' ṣṭamī budhadinaṃ brahmarkṣamatra kṣaṇe
GK19gp01-11u:2591: yasmād viśvāvasau varṣe janma tvajjanmanaḥ śiśoḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2596: āyatyāṃ munayo' py asmin kuryurmanasa āyatim ||JGc_1,6.40|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2597: eṣa vakṣyati śāstrāṇi śastrāṇy apy ātmatejasā;
GK19gp01-11u:2600: bhāvatkānāṃ ca tad bhavyaṃ bhavasya ca bhavasya ca ||JGc_1,6.42|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2601: asyāścaryā caryā vahati bahunāṃ kutuhalaṃ bahulam |
GK19gp01-11u:2602: sasurān asurān dunvan bhavati surāṇāṃ purāpy asāv avitā ||JGc_1,6.43|| [udgīti]
GK19gp01-11u:2603: sahajapremṇāṃ bhavatām amunā kiṃ tāraṇaṃ citram?
GK19gp01-11u:2604: tān api kṛtrimahārdān sarvān nistārayed eṣaḥ ||JGc_1,6.44|| [āryā]
GK19gp01-11u:2605: “tasmān nandātmajas te yad api hari-samaḥ sarva-sādguṇya-vṛttyā
GK19gp01-11u:2607: vaśyaṃ kurvan sva-devaṃ harim amum api taṃ svāṅgajaṃ nirmimīṣe
GK19gp01-11u:2608: tad vīra tvāṃ vinā na svayam ayam ayate svairatāṃ svāvanāya ||JGc_1,6.45|| [śārdulavikrīḍitam]
GK19gp01-11u:2609: [45] “tad evaṃ bhavadbhiḥ sva-devena tulya-guṇiny asmiṃs tan-nāmāny eva kāmaṃ gaṇanīyānīti saṅkṣepeṇārtha-nikṣepaḥ |“
GK19gp01-11u:2610: [46] tad evam ākarṇya joṣaṃ juṣamāṇe tu vraja-rāje,
GK19gp01-11u:2612: bhavad-icchayā vayam evāgamya cāgamya cānayor dvijāti-saṃskārān kariṣyāmaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:2617: sāvitra-samāvartana-vivāha-vṛttaṃ tu na svayam udyama-pātraṃ kāryaṃ,
GK19gp01-11u:2618: kintu samaya-jñair asamaya-jñair asmābhir eva” iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2619: [47] tataś ca kṣaṇaṃ munitām eva vyavasyan munis tau paśyan vaśya-manā babhūva | tataś ca,
GK19gp01-11u:2621: tad api munis taj jñānaṃ śaṅkitavān saṅkucann āsīt ||JGc_1,6.46|| [upagīti]
GK19gp01-11u:2622: saṅkocād iva gopa prabhum anu sa munir vidhāpayann ājñām |
GK19gp01-11u:2623: calito' py alabhata tasmin sthita iva tat-tat-parisphūrtim ||JGc_1,6.47|| [āryā]
GK19gp01-11u:2624: [48] calana-samaye tu śrīmān vrajeśaḥ svayam anuvrajya bālakābhyām abhyavādayata |
GK19gp01-11u:2625: sa ca, “sa-gave saha-putrāya svasti te' stu vrajāmy aham” iti vyaktam uktavān |
GK19gp01-11u:2626: [49] tataś cātmano mahatā suprajastvena vraja-rājaḥ svāntar evam ātmānam āmantrya vadan nananda,
GK19gp01-11u:2627: “putro labdhaḥ sucirād iṣṭaḥ sa mahadbhir evam ādiṣṭaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2628: asmāt pūrṇānandān manuṣva nanu nanda-pūrṇo' smi ||JGc_1,6.48|| [āryā]
GK19gp01-11u:2629: [50] atha munaye sa dākṣiṇyāya sa-dakṣiṇānāṃ gavām ayutaṃ prayutaṃ ca gopair indragopa-varṇānāṃ svarṇānāṃ parokṣaṃ vihāpayāmāsa,
GK19gp01-11u:2631: [51] atha nija-dvija-svajana-vargān āhūya ca bhūyaḥ prakaṭam eva viśaṅkaṭa-tat-tan-nāma-karaṇa-parvaṇā sarvān ānanditavān iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2632: [52] tad evam avadhārayan madhukaṇṭhaḥ saha-vismaya-gadgada-kaṇṭham āha sma,
GK19gp01-11u:2634: aho kṛṣṇasya tat-kartā gargas tena prasidhyati ||JGc_1,6.49|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2636: “tasmān nandātmajas te yad api hari-samaḥ” iti yad uktam,
GK19gp01-11u:2638: nārāyaṇa-samo guṇaiḥ [BhP 10.8.19] iti hi śrīmad-bhāgavata-sthaṃ tad vākyam apīdṛśaṃ dṛśyate,
GK19gp01-11u:2639: tat-puruṣa-bahuvrīhibhyāṃ śliṣṭatvād asyādhikatvaṃ ca lakṣyate iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2640: [54] prakaṭaṃ covāca-nanu nāma-karaṇaṃ viśiṣya na proktam anna-prāśanaṃ tu na kiñcid apīti |
GK19gp01-11u:2641: tac ca tac ca stūyamānatayā prastūyatām |
GK19gp01-11u:2643: tan nāma-karaṇaṃ cānna-prāśanaṃ ca vraje mahaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2644: yātam asman-mano-rājyaṃ na pṛthak stotum īśmahe ||JGc_1,6.50|| iti | [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2645: [56] tad idaṃ procya punaḥ sānandam uvāca-tataḥ śrūyatām uttara-vṛttāntaḥ:
GK19gp01-11u:2646: yadavadhi gargaḥ prayayau vraja-sadanān nāma nirmāya |
GK19gp01-11u:2647: kramatas tadavadhi pṛthukāv abhimānyete sma tena svaiḥ ||JGc_1,6.51|| [upagīti]
GK19gp01-11u:2654: tadā janaka-diṣṭayā tanayam iṣṭam āhūya tam |
GK19gp01-11u:2656: prasūr amṛta-bhṛt-prabhā jagati śarma sā nirmame ||JGc_1,6.53|| [pṛthvī]
GK19gp01-11u:2666: akalita-jana-milane tasmād apasārī | jananīṃ prati gati-cāpala-bhārī ||
GK19gp01-11u:2668: vapuṣi mṛdā maline mṛdutām apahārī | jananī-kara-kṛta-mṛjayā hārī ||
GK19gp01-11u:2669: api tandrāvalane stanapām anukārī | jananī-smita-patad-amṛtāsārī ||JGc_1,6.55|| iti
GK19gp01-11u:2673: tat tu tat trayam anu dvayos tayoḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2677: kālenālpena rājarṣe rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca gokule |
GK19gp01-11u:2679: [59] yathā ca śambara-gṛhāt prathama-vayasaḥ pradyumnasyāgamana-samaye prāha-kṛṣṇaṃ matvā striyo hrītā nililyustatra tatra ha [BhP 10.55.28] iti | tatra ca-
GK19gp01-11u:2680: na navyād yauvanād anyāvasthā tasyeti yan matam |
GK19gp01-11u:2682: [60] yataḥ priyajanabhāvabhāvita eva tasyāvirbhāva ity avādi sma | tatra tadbhāvo yathā:
GK19gp01-11u:2683: utkaṇṭhā vaṣṭi tṛptiṃ sthavayitum abhitaḥ sā tu śaśvat kṛśantī
GK19gp01-11u:2684: tām evoccair bakāreḥ sthavayati jhaṭiti prema-bhājāṃ janānām |
GK19gp01-11u:2685: yadyapy evaṃ tathāpi prathamaja-vayasas tūrdhvagāṃ tat-tad-īhāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:2686: noṣṭas te suṣṭhu kintu prasṛmara-madhurimṇy eva tāṃ nirmimāte ||JGc_1,6.58|| [sragdharā]
GK19gp01-11u:2687: [61] atha kālenālpena ity ādau līlāyāḥ sādhu-rīti-madhuratāsvādyatām | [62] tatra gati-śikṣā yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:2689: putre skhalati sā jīyān mātuḥ putrasya ca tvarā ||JGc_1,6.59|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2690: dvitra-kramaṃ gataḥ kṛṣṇaś calitaḥ skhalane rudan |
GK19gp01-11u:2691: putra putreti cumbantīm ambām ālolayan muhuḥ ||JGc_1,6.60|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2694: dūraṃ mātur yadā yāti tadāsau mantharāyate |
GK19gp01-11u:2695: samīpaṃ tu yadā tarhi smayamāno drutāyate ||JGc_1,6.62|| [anuṣṭubh]

GK19gp01-11u:2706: ity ādi mātṛ-sutayoḥ saṃvādavad abhūd iha ||JGc_1,6.66|| [anuṣṭubh]

GK19gp01-11u:2720: daṃṣṭrāṃ dhitsati daṃṣṭriṇaḥ phaṇi-pater udyat-phaṇāṃ śṛṅgiṇaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:2721: śṛṅgaṃ prajvalad-arciṣaṃ huta-bhujaḥ koṭiṃ ca khaḍgādinaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2722: itthaṃ bhrātṛ-yugaṃ nivartitam api prāgalbhyam evāsadan
GK19gp01-11u:2723: mātros tena samasta-vismṛtir abhūd gehe' pi dehe' pi ca ||JGc_1,6.71|| [śārdula]
GK19gp01-11u:2728: śiśunā bhīṣma-grahaṇe sthāne mātur bhayaṃ yato mātā |
GK19gp01-11u:2729: kavayas tv idam anumimate tejasvitvasya bījaṃ tat ||JGc_1,6.73|| [āryā]
GK19gp01-11u:2730: yaṃ yaṃ padārtham atitīvram iyaṃ prayāti
GK19gp01-11u:2731: bhrātṛ-dvayī, sa ca sa ca pratibhāti saumyaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2734: [67] atha krameṇa mātṛ-vañcanī buddhir apy udbuddhā | yatra yatra sa ca sa ca,
GK19gp01-11u:2739: [68] alpa-hīna-hāyana-vayastve tu jāte yatra kutracit krīḍanāya nirgacchantau na sambhālayituṃ śakyete |
GK19gp01-11u:2740: sambhālitau ca tau kuto līyeta iti nāvadhārayituṃ pāryete |
GK19gp01-11u:2741: [69] atha jananī-dvayam ubhayato vartmāvṛtya paritaś ca dhātrīr avadhāna-vidhātrīr vitatya dravantau tatra-bhavantau gṛhṇāti |
GK19gp01-11u:2742: [70] tato rudantau hasantau ca tau gṛhāntarānītāv udvartanādinā veṣa-parivartanādinā ca stana-pāyanādinā śāyanādinā ca rocayati |
GK19gp01-11u:2743_0: [71] tad evaṃ varṇanam ākarṇayatsu sabhāsatsu prahasatsu śrīmad-vraja-purandara-kula-dhurandhara-kiśora-vare
GK19gp01-11u:2743_1: cānavarajena saha dara-smita-sundaratara-vadanatayā netrādaraṇīye sati samāpanāya
GK19gp01-11u:2747: anya-dinavat kathakān sa prasādhanaṃ sedhayāmāsa śubha-caritrī-vraja-dharitrīśaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2756: [1] atha dināntaravat prabhātāntaḥ prabhātāyāṃ sabhāyāṃ madhukaṇṭha uvāca-snigdhakaṇṭha,
GK19gp01-11u:2758: [2] atha varṣa-jāte jāte nabhasye māsi sarva-sampan-mayaṃ janma-dinam āyātam |
GK19gp01-11u:2759: tatra ca gargopadeśa-vargopāśrayā kṛṣṇasya janma-tithi-pūjā pūryate sma |
GK19gp01-11u:2760: yatra ca vraja-kṣiti-patinā praśasta-vācanādi-pūrvakāpūrva-parva pravartayāmāsa | yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:2767: tathā tat-parvaṇo' py āsīt sphuṭaṃ yad-abhidā dvayoḥ ||JGc_1,7.2|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2769: tat-tan-nāmnā pracāro' bhūt tasya tasya vraje tataḥ ||JGc_1,7.3|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2771: kadācid varṣiyaḥ-prabhṛtiṣu strī-puṃseṣu tat-tat-kṛti-vyāpṛteṣu nijotsaṅgena bāla-gopālaḥ sva-mandirālinde jananyā lālyate sma, yathā--
GK19gp01-11u:2772: mukhe mukhaṃ lagayati cumbati sma tad
GK19gp01-11u:2774: hasaty atho hasati ca tatra bālake
GK19gp01-11u:2776_0: [4] tataś ca pūrva-pūrva-nihiṃsanāt prajāta-mati-bhraṃśena dhairya-rahitatayā kaṃsena
GK19gp01-11u:2776_1: prahitaḥ sumanasām ahitaḥ sura-vartmani dūrataḥ sthitas tṛṇāvartas taṃ tathā vartamānaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:2777: so' yam eva toyada-varṇaḥ pṛthukaḥ pṛthu-gṛhālindaṃ vindamānāyā mātur aṅke vartata iti śaṅke |
GK19gp01-11u:2778: [5] tad evam adhunā sarvaṃ dhunānaḥ sāmbālam eva bālaṃ sura-vartmani vartayāṇi |
GK19gp01-11u:2780: śakaṭaś ca śakaṭāviṣṭāmūrtatā-valanayā chalayitum iṣṭenāpy anena diṣṭāntam āpyate sma |
GK19gp01-11u:2782: [6] tadā ca sadā tad-avasaram anusarantī tu yoga-māyā tad-vapur-yogam āyātā,
GK19gp01-11u:2784: yena ca tad-ambā komala-nīla-kamalāyamāna-kalevarasyāpi tasya bhāram asahamānā vismayamānā cānyasya tad-bhārāsahatayā sahasā bhūmāv eva taṃ dhṛtavatī,
GK19gp01-11u:2786: atibhītā ca tad-upadrava-bādhanāya tad-ārādhanāya vyagra-cittā babhūva |
GK19gp01-11u:2787: [7] tṛṇāvartas tu vātāvartena vartamānaḥ sura-vartmani taṃ ca vartayan gala-graha-pāśam iva sañjagrāha |
GK19gp01-11u:2789: yatra ca trasam atrasam api sarvaṃ vitrastam asti sma | tataś ca,
GK19gp01-11u:2790: tamobhir āvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ bahir eva na kevalam |
GK19gp01-11u:2792: [8] tena tu durjanena tadaivam anyūnānāṃ janyūnām ajanye janyamāne tatra vitrastāḥ prajāḥ prajajalpuḥ, yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:2794: dhvānas truṭy-utkuṭheṣu prakaṭa-kaṭa-kaṭeṣv ardhayan vāyur āyuḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2795: goṣṭhaṃ koṣṭhaṃ ca bhindann naṭati bata hahā hanta kiṃ tatra vṛttaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:2798: upadrave' sminn adhi yad dadhe sutaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:2803: avīkṣya paśupeśvarī bata jagāma yāṃ vyagratām |
GK19gp01-11u:2805: yadi sphurati naicikī kvacana kācid ūhate tām ||JGc_1,7.8|| [pṛthvī]
GK19gp01-11u:2806: [9] tadā ca tām ārabhya jana-rodana-paramparayā paritaḥ prasarpaṇād amandena tad-ākrandena sarva-gokulam ākulaṃ babhūva |
GK19gp01-11u:2807: [10] avigaṇayya ca tādṛśaṃ visadṛśam upadravaṃ sadravam evāgamyāgamyāpāra-duḥkha-vāra-vārāṃ nidhau sarve mamajjuḥ | tatra ca-
GK19gp01-11u:2809: tadīyānāṃ yathā sāsīd ubhayeṣāṃ yathā truṭiḥ ||JGc_1,7.9|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2810: [11] tataś ca, sarvāsu nirviśeṣaṃ rodana-vaśatāṃ viśantīṣu, hā rohiṇi, drohiṇi, kiṃ kariṣyāmi?
GK19gp01-11u:2812: kathaṃ vā vraja-rāja-diśi mukhaṃ vitariṣyāmi iti paryantaṃ paryanta-daśāvasānam anu yaḥ khalv aśeṣa-vilāpanaḥ prasū-vilāpaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2813: sa punar avakalitaḥ sahasā ghṛtam iva vilālayati hṛdayam |
GK19gp01-11u:2815: ity alam atiprasaṅgena iti madhukaṇṭhaḥ svasya sarvasya ca vaivaśya-vaśyatām āśaṅkya maṅkṣu saṅkathayāmāsa,
GK19gp01-11u:2816: [12] nabhasā hṛtasya sujātasya śrīman-nanda-jātasya tasya bandhūnām avagāḍha-duḥsaha-sāda-sindhūnāṃ sahasānukūlaṃ kūlam āsannam | tathā hi,
GK19gp01-11u:2821: bhujāpīḍanavat tasya bhāraś ca vavṛdhe śiśoḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2822: voḍhuṃ tyaktuṃ ca roddhuṃ ca nāśakad dānavādhamaḥ ||JGc_1,7.11|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2827: kṛṣṇo' vaveṣṭad ātmāṅgaṃ vātūlaḥ katham ujjhatu? ||JGc_1,7.13|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2830: tadaiva ca bahir vātās tat kiṃ tasya ta eva te? ||JGc_1,7.14|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2831: [13] athākāśāvakāśāt prastara-kṛtāstaraṇāyām aṅgaṇa-sthalyām ativistīrṇaṃ mahā-ghoṣa-badhirī-kṛta-ghoṣaṃ tad-vapur nipapāta |
GK19gp01-11u:2832: nipatya ca mūrtiman mūrtikam api ślatha-sandhi-bandhī-bhūtam adṛśyata | tataś ca, tat tu,
GK19gp01-11u:2835: bhayam adhur atha kaṃ nirīkṣya rakṣas
GK19gp01-11u:2841: [14] atha mantravat kiñcid vacanāt punar amūr amuṣyāś cetanām ācinvate sma, yathā,
GK19gp01-11u:2846: śiśum upasadya yaśodā danuja-hṛtaṃ drāk ciceta līnāpi |
GK19gp01-11u:2851: na tarhy abhūd yad abhavad eka-bhāvatā ||JGc_1,7.19|| [rucirā]
GK19gp01-11u:2852: paśyann api tṛṇāvartam apaśyann iva taṃ janaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2853: kṛṣṇam evāgamad draṣṭuṃ tat-premā hy adbhutādijit ||JGc_1,7.20|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2854: spṛṣṭaḥ kampreṇa hastena dṛṣṭaḥ sāsreṇa cakṣuṣā |
GK19gp01-11u:2855: pitrātha mātur utsaṅgād avitrā śiśur ādade ||JGc_1,7.21|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2860: svayā paraṃ na tu parayā parīkṣyate ||JGc_1,7.22|| [rucirā]
GK19gp01-11u:2861: [16] atha vyagrehitā vṛṣabhānv-agresarāḥ parama-hitāḥ parasparam aparasparaṃ kathayāñcakruḥ-
GK19gp01-11u:2863: kva tīrṇavān so' yam atīva bālakaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2866: [17] athavāsmākam eva bhāgyam idam iti yogyam | tathā hi-

GK19gp01-11u:2874: sarvadā kramate yasya buddhiḥ sad-bhaktaye hareḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2875: sa sadā kramate tasya lakṣmīś ca kramatetarām ||JGc_1,7.26|| [anuṣṭubh] iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2876: [18] devāś ca sa-kautukam imaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇābhiprāyam utprekṣāṃ cakrire |
GK19gp01-11u:2879: tena tvaṃ yadi maraṇaṃ prayāsi kaḥ svid
GK19gp01-11u:2880: doṣaḥ syān mama tam atha tvam eva jalpa ||JGc_1,7.27|| [praharṣiṇī] iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2881: [19] tataś ca sarvānarvācīnābhīra-vīrāṇāṃ seyaṃ mantraṇā jātā,
GK19gp01-11u:2883: tasmād gṛha eva gopanīyam idaṃ bāla-yugalam iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2884: [20] tataḥ śaṅkātiśaya-mayaṃ dina-katipayaṃ nānā-krīḍanakena krīḍayamānā mātṛ-samānā gopikā gopikā babhūvuḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2885: yatra ca bāla-bālikā-kula-pālikādayaḥ sadayaṃ samāgamya ramyaṃ tat-keli-kutūhalaṃ kalayanti, yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:2891: bālena samam anyo' nyaṃ prābalyaṃ darśayann iva |
GK19gp01-11u:2892: ūrdhvādho-bhāvam āsādya sarvā hāsayati sma saḥ ||JGc_1,7.29|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2893: mātṝṇām agrato bāhū vikṣipan dhāvati sma saḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2894: darśayann iva tejaḥ svaṃ hasan pāte ruroda ca ||JGc_1,7.30|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2895: balaṃ vā jñānaṃ vā kiyad abhavad asyeti vimṛśan
GK19gp01-11u:2896: yadā gopī-saṅghaḥ kim api muhur ānetum adiśat |
GK19gp01-11u:2897: tadā śaktiṃ vyañjan kva ca punar aśaktiṃ kva ca śiśuḥ
GK19gp01-11u:2898: sa paśyaṃs tad-vaktraṃ hasati ca puro hāsayati ca ||JGc_1,7.31|| [śikhariṇī]
GK19gp01-11u:2900: kṛṣṇaś ca kurute bāḍhaṃ cakre tasyā na kiṃ tadā? ||JGc_1,7.32|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2907: ity aṅganābhir uditas thi thi thitthi thīti
GK19gp01-11u:2909: māṃ nartayata bho vṛddhāḥ, iti tāsāṃ puro gataḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2910: bhadraṃ nṛtyasi bhadras tvam, iti stotrān nanarta saḥ ||JGc_1,7.36|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2912: nṛtyan vrīḍitavat kṛṣṇo mātur aṅke' palāyata ||JGc_1,7.37|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2913: [21] kṣaṇaṃ viramya ca ramyānanaḥ stana-dhayanam api tatrārabdhavān,
GK19gp01-11u:2914: yad darśanam anu saṅkarṣaṇaḥ serṣyam iva nijam utkarṣaṃ vāñchan nija-jananī-stana-pānam ārabdhavān |
GK19gp01-11u:2915: [22] tadaiva ca tau līlābhiḥ pramīlām āgatau yātṛbhyāṃ mātṛbhyāṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ śayyām adhiśāyyete sma |
GK19gp01-11u:2916: [23] tad evaṃ sarāmasya tasya nirodhe vidhīyamāne bahir vijihīrṣite cātīva tad-upajīvana-pīvatām āsann eva yogamāyā tad-anukulyāya kiñcit prapañcitavatī, yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:2920: lālayantī mukhaṃ viśvaṃ jṛmbhato dadṛśe idam ||[BhP 10.7.34-5] iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2921: [24] tena ca santataṃ vismayamānāyāṃ nijajāyāyāṃ tasyāṃ kadācit śrīmān vrajarājaḥ papraccha,
GK19gp01-11u:2922: mayā yad aniṣṭa-bhayād bāla-rodhanam upadiṣṭam, tat kiṃ nirvahati?
GK19gp01-11u:2923: [25] sā prāha-nirvahaty eva, kintu vṛtheti lakṣyate |
GK19gp01-11u:2926: dṛṣṭaṃ tu mṛṣṭa-smitaṃ jṛmbhamānasya bālakasya vadana-dvārā jagad eva iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2927: [28] atha vrajarājaḥ sa-vailakṣyam ālakṣya lakṣmī-jāni-lakṣyatayā maunam ālambya vilambya covāca-yady evam,
GK19gp01-11u:2928: tadā svajana-parāyaṇasya śrī-nārāyaṇasya vidhitsitam eva sarvaṃ vicikitsitam api cikitsitaṃ kariṣyati |
GK19gp01-11u:2930: [29] evaṃ tad-avadhi tad-vidhinā nātinirodhe vidhīyamāne kvacid api samaye saṃyamanaṃ samayā sarāmaḥ sa rāmānujaḥ śrīdāma-sudāma-vasudāmādibhiḥ samaṃ ramate sma |
GK19gp01-11u:2931: [30] tatra vinodena mṛdadanaṃ cakrāṇe cakrāṅkita-caraṇe saṅkarṣaṇā-dayaḥ khelāyāṃ kalita-kalahā rahas tan-mātaraṃ nivedayāmāsuḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:2932: ye khalu tayā tad-vidha-vidhāne' vadhāpitā vidhīyante sma |
GK19gp01-11u:2933: [31] mātā ca pracchannam āgacchantī bāhuṃ gṛhītvā papraccha, capala, kim idaṃ duścaritam ācaritam?
GK19gp01-11u:2934: [32] sa tu sahasā saṅkalitānana-kamalaḥ kātara-matir mātaram uvāca-mātar, na kim api |
GK19gp01-11u:2938: [36] suta uvāca-ete khalu nija-nija-vastyān madhura-vastūni muṣṇantaḥ sa-tṛṣṇam atrapam atra parasparam aśnanti,
GK19gp01-11u:2939: tad anaṅgī-kṛtavataḥ kapāṭita-radane mama vadane prathamaṃ samaṃ balāc chalād api samarpayanti,
GK19gp01-11u:2940: tac ca tvayi sa-nirvedaṃ nivedayitum icchor mama tucchaṃ sa-vivādaṃ durvādam etam avādiṣuḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2941: [37] mātā suvismitam ūrdhvam adho mūrdhānam ādhūya sasmitam uvāca-savyāja-rāja! tavāpy agrajaḥ so' yaṃ vyañjayati,
GK19gp01-11u:2943: [38] suta uvāca-ete sarva eva vīthyāṃ vīthyāṃ mithyābhiśaṃsinaḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2945: balabhadraḥ kim iti pramiti-rahitam abhadraṃ vadatu?
GK19gp01-11u:2946: [40] suta uvāca-ayam apy etad-gaṇa-pātīti tathānyedyur mṛttikām atti sma,
GK19gp01-11u:2947: tad avadyaṃ nivedayitum udyataṃ mad-vacanaṃ mṛṣodyatām āsādayitum iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2948: [41] mātā tan-mukhaṃ dhṛtvā sahāsam āha sma, kim idaṃ ciraṃ nigirann asi?
GK19gp01-11u:2949: [42] suta uvāca-uktam eva mama lapane balād galāntaḥ praveśāya kim api nyastaṃ samastaiḥ iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2951: [44] suta uvāca-sāmprataṃ mama mukham eva nirīkṣyatām |
GK19gp01-11u:2953: [46] tataś ca bhayena sa eṣa mṛc-cihnitam apy ahnāya vadanaṃ vyādadau |
GK19gp01-11u:2954: [47] tatas tad-bhayam avadadhānā samādadhānā ca rasāntareṇa mātuḥ kopa-śāntaye tad-antar-yogam āyātā sā yogamāyā punar viśvaṃ darśitavatī |
GK19gp01-11u:2956: aho bahir ivekṣyate jagad idaṃ mukhābhyantare
GK19gp01-11u:2957: śiśos tad anu bhūr iyaṃ bhuvi ca māthuraṃ maṇḍalam |
GK19gp01-11u:2958: iha vraja-kulaṃ yad anv api mayā dhṛto bālakaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:2959: sa eva tad aho kathaṃ kim iva hanta kiṃ sidhyati ||JGc_1,7.38|| [pṛthvī]
GK19gp01-11u:2960: [49] atha punaḥ svapnādikam analpaṃ kalpayitvā paścimam idaṃ niścikāya,
GK19gp01-11u:2962: sutaḥ sa eṣa svam idaṃ ca gokulam |
GK19gp01-11u:2965_0: [50] tad evaṃ sa ca nārāyaṇas tad-bhāva-parāyaṇatāṃ tām anu nitāntāṃ vicārayann ātmanaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:2965_1: paramābhiruci-paricitāvirbhāve tasminn eva vismiti-nicitaṃ janany-ucita-sneham eva dehayāmāsa,
GK19gp01-11u:2966: yaṃ khalu nemaṃ viriñci [BhP 10.9.20] vakṣyamāṇānusāreṇa samastāni śāstrāṇi sadā praśastatayā gāyanti |
GK19gp01-11u:2968_0: tad evaṃ sarvānandanaḥ śrīman-nanda-nandanaḥ krīṇīhi bhoḥ phalāni iti [BhP 10.11.10]
GK19gp01-11u:2968_1: gīti-rīti-rocana-vacanaṃ karṇayor āracayann eva capala-locanaḥ kiñcanāpy ālocayann
GK19gp01-11u:2968_2: eva ca laghunāpi pāṇi-yugalena laghutayā puraḥ patita-dhānya-puñjataḥ pūrṇam añjalim
GK19gp01-11u:2969: kintu drava-vaśād alpakāñjalitaḥ skhalitam idam iti bhidāṃ na vidāñcakāra,
GK19gp01-11u:2970: kevalam eva kara-yugalaṃ krayya-phala-pūrita-tat-patra-pātropari parivṛttyā ca cālayāmāsa |
GK19gp01-11u:2971_1: vyañjita-spṛhāvalīṃ tad-añjaliṃ phala-valayena bhikṣayantī dūrata eva saṅkalana-mudrām
GK19gp01-11u:2971_2: api śikṣayantī sakalena tu pūrayituṃ śaśāka |
GK19gp01-11u:2972: [53] nija-bhājanaṃ phala-riktaṃ babhūva vā na vā kim iti tu na viviktuṃ cakāra |
GK19gp01-11u:2973_0: gṛhābhyantareṇāntarite tu tasmin nijaṃ patrajam amatram ayatnatayā ratna-pūritam
GK19gp01-11u:2973_1: apy anibhālya bhāram apy asambhālya tan-mādhuryāveśābhiniveśavatī svajanānām api
GK19gp01-11u:2973_2: śarma-jananāya bahula-phalāvali-bali-samānayanāya ca nija-nilayam eva jagāma |
GK19gp01-11u:2974: kintu gṛhaṃ gatvā jñāta-maṇi-tattvāpy akuṇṭhāsakṛd-utkaṇṭhāvahena tan-mukha-śobhābhara-viraheṇa sā dhanyā hārita-mahā-dhanaṃ-manyā babhūva,
GK19gp01-11u:2975: yata eva sā kṛṣṇa-dṛśvarī viśvam api visasmāra
GK19gp01-11u:2977_1: nṛtyann iva mātuḥ samīpam añcan madhura-cañcalehitas tasyā nicolāñcale nirbandhataḥ
GK19gp01-11u:2980: kadācid ācita-phalā dhānyāni mūlyam ādāya dhanyā mayi cānukūlyam ādhāya samarpitavatī |
GK19gp01-11u:2981: [57] mātovāca-vatsa, gṛhajanavat sarvataḥ pratītiṃ mā kṛthāḥ iti |
GK19gp01-11u:2982: [58] sutas tu kā khalv apratītir iti ca na vidāñcakāra |
GK19gp01-11u:2983: [59] kṣaṇataś ca tāṃ gatāṃ nirīkṣya punar āgataḥ sakṣaṇatayā janāya tat-phala-vibhajanāya jananīṃ niyojayāmāsa |
GK19gp01-11u:2984: [60] mātā cāmandenānandena kṛta-spandena kara-dvandvena tāni vibhajantī tadantīkṛtiṃ nāsasāda |
GK19gp01-11u:2986: tad-āsvāda-karāś ca labdha-camatkārā na vismaranti sma |
GK19gp01-11u:2992: [62] tadā caikadā gṛha-vyaya-payaḥ-kṛte samīpakṛte vatsa-sadmani ruddha-dvārān śakṛt-kari-sārān bāla-hariḥ paritaḥ-sthita-bālaka-jālaḥ kalayāmāsa | tatra ca,
GK19gp01-11u:2993: vatsīr matvā tadā dhenūś chāga-tokāni vatsakān |
GK19gp01-11u:2995: vatsīṣu yarhi gavyanto goduhanti sma te' rbhakāḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:2996: teṣāṃ prahāsajā bhāsaḥ payasyante sma tās tadā ||JGc_1,7.42|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3001: [63] tac ca tarṇakānugatayā tayoḥ prathamam abhyarṇāgamanam ākarṇya nirvarṇya ca vara-varṇinyaḥ skhalad-varṇaṃ varṇayāmāsuḥ | tathā hi gītam-
GK19gp01-11u:3016: [64] tad evam aṅganād aṅganād vrajāṅganābhir aham-pūrvikayānugamyamānau,
GK19gp01-11u:3020: tāsu ca kābhiścid amṛtam anṛtaṃ kurvatā praticarvaṇaṃ sarasena rasa-visareṇa bhojyamānau,
GK19gp01-11u:3021: tadvad ekābhir nija-gṛhājīvya-divya-maṇi-hāram upahāram upahāraṃ hāritayopayojyamānau tadvad varṇyamānau,
GK19gp01-11u:3022: tāsu ca kābhir api premānugamya-ramya-vacana-pracaya-racanayā kañcana kālaṃ varivasyamānau,
GK19gp01-11u:3024: tadvad anyatarābhis tan-madhura-cakura-cikura-cañcuratā-pracura-cañcalatāṃ nicāyya cāturyataś caritam idaṃ bhavan-mātṛ-caraṇeṣu gocarayāmaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:3026: tābhir eva mātara-pitarāv ārabhya gaṇanālabhya-kulāli-gāli-pālim upalabhya kalita-vyalīkam iva sa-kolāhala-praṇaya-kalita-kalitayā tarjyamānau
GK19gp01-11u:3028_0: [65] atha mātarāv api jātāv amū kutra yātāv iti kātarāyamāṇa-nayane nirjanatā-janita-svairatā-bhāg-ayane
GK19gp01-11u:3028_1: vraja-nīvṛd-ayane ruṣā ninditābhir upamātṛbhir mudā vanditābhir api tad-abhidhātṛ-yātṛbhiḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3028_2: samam eva gṛhataḥ kṛta-niryāṇe svayam eva samyag mṛgayamāṇe dara-sarasi-janija-cihna-vigata-nihnava-caraṇa-lakṣaṇa-vilakṣaṇa-vartma-valanena
GK19gp01-11u:3029: tadā ca nijāgamana-varjanīṃ tarjanīm abhicālya pracchannatayā nibhālya tasmād akasmād anayor bāhū jagṛhatuḥ |
GK19gp01-11u:3030: bālakās tu sarvataḥ sarva eva dudruvuḥ,

GK19gp01-11u:3380: [62] śrī-vraja-rājas tv avarātmajaṃ rāmam api samānīya tena sutena ca sārdhaṃ tayoḥ snigdha-kala-kolāhala-nidigdhaḥ sagdhim ācaritavān |
GK19gp01-11u:3381: tābhyāṃ mūrta-paramānanda-pūrtābhyāṃ muhūrtam ekaṃ viśramya ca samyag-īdṛg-auśīra-sukha-dhīra-cetā gavāgamana-ramya-samaye gosthānam āgamya go-dohanādi-kāryaṃ ca kārayati sma |

GK19gp01-11u:3386: [65] rājan, kṛṣṇa-janany adya na bhuktavatī, na kenacid uktavatī ca vartate |

GK19gp01-11u:3393: [68] vrajarājas tu sa-smitaḥ sutam apṛcchat, sva-mātaraṃ yāsyasi?
GK19gp01-11u:3394: [69] kṛṣṇa uvāca-nahi nahi, kintu tvām eva samayā samayān gamayiṣyāmi |
GK19gp01-11u:3395: [70] atha rāja-jyāyaḥ-prajāvatyaḥ sahāsam ūcuḥ-stanaṃ kasya pāsyasi?

GK19gp01-11u:3400: [75] kṛṣṇaḥ sa-roṣāsram uvāca-māṃ vihāyeyam apīyāya iti |
GK19gp01-11u:3401: [76] tad etad ākarṇya sāsrā rohiṇī nīcair uvāca-putra, kathaṃ kaṭhorāyase? mātā tava duḥkhāyate |

GK19gp01-11u:3404: tena gṛhīta-hastaḥ punar asau nirasta-tad-dhastatayā vidrutya pitur utsaṅga-saṅgī babhūva |

GK19gp01-11u:3406: [78] vraja-rājas tu mātary antaḥ-sneham asya paryālocya tad abhivyaktaye hastaṃ kiñcid udastaṃ vidhāyābhidadhe-putra,

GK19gp01-11u:4236: [49] tathaiva hi teṣāṃ kāla-deśa-viparyayā paryālocanāya druhiṇa-devena sneha-dehany anavadya-vidyeyam udbhāvitā | etad evoktam-
GK19gp01-11u:4238: vatsān pulinam āninye yathā pūrva-sakhaṃ svakam ||[BhP 10.14.42] iti |
GK19gp01-11u:4240: ūcuś ca suhṛdaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ, svāgataṃ te' tiraṃhasā |
GK19gp01-11u:4241: naiko' py abhoji kavala, ehītaḥ sādhu bhujyatām ||
GK19gp01-11u:4243: darśayaṃś carmājagaraṃ nyavartata vanād vrajam ||[BhP 10.14.45-46] iti |
GK19gp01-11u:4244: [51] carma cedam etāvantaṃ samayaṃ yathāvad eva yogamāyayāntardhāpitam iti gamyam |
GK19gp01-11u:4245: [52] tataś ca saṃvatsara-prasara-vatsa-vatsapāla-bāla-viraha-virahān mahatānandena mahitas tair eva sahitaḥ saṃhita-sampad-vrajaṃ vrajaṃ praviśan,
GK19gp01-11u:4247: pūrva-pūrvato' py apūrvaṃ parva parvati sma | tathā hy uktam-
GK19gp01-11u:4252: [53] tataś ca pitṛ-sambandhibhir nanda-sūnur iti mātṛ-sambandhibhir yaśodā-sūnur iti tasya nāmānūdya,
GK19gp01-11u:4253: sadya eva siddham iti cirantanam api tac-caritaṃ jage | tad yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:4254: nanda-tanūjanur adya vyālam | hatavān hṛtavān asmat-kālam ||iti dhru ||
GK19gp01-11u:4255: adya yaśodā-sūnur vyālam | hatavān hṛtavān asmat-kālam ||iti vā ||
GK19gp01-11u:4256: oṣṭhādharam iha jalada-taṭāliḥ | dambhāvalir api dantaka-pāliḥ ||
GK19gp01-11u:4259: ahim anv ahitāṃ kalpayamānān | girir iti taṃ viśataḥ kṛta-mānān ||
GK19gp01-11u:4262: tasmād bahir atha niṣkāsitavān | punar iha nikhilaṃ bata darśitavān ||
GK19gp01-11u:4263: prāṇād adhikaḥ so' yaṃ prāṇān | rakṣann asmān kurute trāṇān ||JGc_1,11.33|| [mātrā-samaka]
GK19gp01-11u:4264: [54] iti śrutvā ca te vrajasthāś cintayāmāsuḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:4265: sādhu-ghātukānāṃ pātukānām āmīṣāṃ katham iva jātu kāmāḥ sidhyeyuḥ? iti |
GK19gp01-11u:4267_0: sukhānubiddhe teṣāṃ same samāgame prātas tu bṛhad-bhrātaram anugamya praṇaya-maya-ramya-roṣam
GK19gp01-11u:4267_1: anunīya dīyamāna-vismayatayā tān ānīya tena caikatra praṇīya śrīvatsa-vatsaḥ pūrvavad
GK19gp01-11u:4268: [56] atha punar madhukaṇṭhaḥ samāpanāya sa-vismayam ivāha sma-
GK19gp01-11u:4271_0: [57] tad evaṃ kathakayoḥ kathāṃ prathayitvā sabhyeṣu sākṣād iva kalita-tat-tat-keli-sandhayoḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4271_1: kṛtāñjali-bandhayos tad-dine' pi pūrvavad eva sarve gṛha-vartmani vartamānā nija-nija-spṛhaṇīyaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4271_2: karma nirmimāṇā api tām eva līlāṃ bṛṃhitāṃ hṛdi jagṛhire |
